name: Create a Buffer status update from a new Microsoft 365 Excel row
description:
This template allows you to create a Buffer status update from a new row in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses [this worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygRNwStAboOU4lqAC?e=HE0ynn).
